title.rendered: Magnus-Aryitey speaks about “breaking the bias” at RTP event commemorating International Women’s Day

content.rendered:
Code the Dream co-Executive Director Daisy Magnus-Aryitey took part in a panel discussion commemorating International Women’s Day at Boxyard RTP on March 9. Aryitey and the other panelists shared their experiences as women in the workplace, their efforts to bring positive change, and their vision of a more equitable future.

Magnus-Aryitey said she is proud of Code the Dream’s workplace environment. “One of the moms on our team brought her daughter to the office on a snowday,” said Magnus-Aryitey. “And I thought, This is exactly what I wanted to build. She did not ask for permission. She did not call. She just knew, because we were moms, because we understood, that she could bring her child. That is what I tried to build every day.” 

Read the full story on WRAL TechWire.

More from the blog:

CTD February 2022 Volunteer of the Month: Kon Ham

From the newsletter: DECODED Winter 2022
